examples.name: collapsible-basic
examples.content:
export const CollapsibleBasic = () => ( Toggle Collapsible Chakra UI embraces this philosophy in the world of design and development. Just like chakras align energy in the body, Chakra UI aligns your design system — bringing flow, consistency, and peace of mind to your codebase. It helps developers focus on creating beautiful, accessible UIs without friction.

Think of each component as a wheel in your app’s UI — smooth, connected, and full of potential. Build with harmony. Build with Chakra UI. )

examples.name: collapsible-lazy-mounted
examples.content:
export const CollapsibleLazyMounted = () => (
  <Collapsible.Root unmountOnExit>
    <Collapsible.Trigger paddingY="3">
      Toggle Collapse (Unmount on exit)
    </Collapsible.Trigger>
    <Collapsible.Content>
      <Box padding="4" borderWidth="1px">
        If you inspect the DOM, you'll notice that the content is unmounted when
        collapsed. This is useful for performance reasons when you have a lot of
        collapsible content.
      </Box>
    </Collapsible.Content>
  </Collapsible.Root>
)
